message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $9,500. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am hoping to stay within my budget. Would you consider lowering the price to $8,500?
Hi Bob, I understand your position. I can come down a bit to $9,000.  This is already a very competitive price for what the product offers.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your price. I appreciate the flexibility. Could we possibly meet somewhere in between at $8,750?
